entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Morden AAFC 02:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.7°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
